members.description: The variant of the notice. Defaults to `inverse`.
members.name: variant

members.description: The priority of the notice. Defaults to `high`. Bolder colors are used with `high` priority whereas lighter colors are used for 'low' priority notices.
members.name: priority

members.description: Indicates whether the notice can be dismissed or not. When dismissable, the dismiss button is rendered and emits 'dismiss' event upon click.
members.name: dismissable

events.description: Fires when the dismiss button is clicked (if dismissable).
events.name: dismiss

declarations.summary: A notice/alert component is a user interface element that displays important messages or alerts to inform or warn users about specific events or actions.
